overview: Meet Ishariah Johnson, known as ‘Stormskater’ – a London-based roller-skater who started skating by picking up techniques from other skaters in different spots across the city. Now one of the most well-known skaters in the UK, Stormskater gives us insight into the sport and its community, as well as exploring issues of appropriation, ownership, authenticity, and the fundamental need for space.
title: Stormskater
